messages.content: I love your response. I wish I were this witty.
I wish I could be desensitized to my sadness sometimes lol
They'd never give her a crown but it would be so good to see her back on my screen.
Yes, because I've always wanted a father figure who throws a tantrum every time he doesn't get his way.
I love [NAME], but man I wish I knew what [NAME] would have been like here.
Don't include me in this us! Just kidding.. We need some love and fast.
I wish I had known this when my kitty ran off years ago. 😭
I wanna die I don't wanna live anymore I really wanna die so bad Please return me to the dark abyss I long for death’s sweet kiss
We need another goal to show for it. Come on boys.
You should have gone and joined her for a drink.... That’s my dream... Eventually sit down and enjoy a drink with my siblings.
I wanna take the hardware out of that guy's face with a pair of pliers.
I wish more people enjoyed that sport.. when that clay explodes you get that FEEL
As a Ringwraith this offends me. Please build me a snowfort.
>I want to ride my bicycle I want to ride my bike Ah yes, truly makes you think
Other than the jerseys, optic merch is like an after thought. Wish they would step it up more.
It's my dream to one day have a completely black wardrobe. For now, I'm stuck with the clothes my mom picks out for me.
Okay rude. Leave [NAME] alone and where he is please. I’ve been rooting for this kid since his first match.
would love to see a win here
I would hope that Cartoon Network would have nothing to do with it. Would hate to see them "Teen Titan" ASOIAF.
I want this back "I want us back" I missed the part where that's my problem
I just spent the whole week sneaking away to smoke, and trying to get into some girls shorts.
I know they don’t want it. I just wish they did.
Crap. I need more Excedrin. STAT.
Not yet! But I waiting for a miracle any year now!!
I want to go scuba diving so bad, but swimming in anything bigger than a pool terrifies me.
We really need to stick to having helpful titles or a quick tldr.
I had to watch x3 to make sure I didn't miss something 😂
She is during her week of taking sugar pills. Yea I do wish she had mentioned it anyway, I can’t sleep
As a Kentucky fan I’ve watched [NAME] all year and he is legit. Just wish there were a scenario that GB could pick him up.
I want to change though. If I'm around those people I will remain the same way. Right?
I personally wish that they stuck with the spin offs but if their happy I’m good.👌
